name: Ye Olde Gunslinger
description:
This game was a personal challenge to myself, to see if I could make most sprites 8x8 (spoiler: I failed... some of the sprites are definitely not 8x8), and I was using a palette that I'm not too familiar with (the palette is my favorite palette now, so it worked out). I'm pretty happy with how it turned out, although it was a little rushed. 

I decided to do something simple and try to "remake" (I put remake in quotes because it ended up being much more different than the original than I had intended) a game I made a while back with a friend, Bad Egg. 

Pro Tip: Pressing Shift allows you to go to the next spell in your arsenal without wasting your current spell. Your current spell will go to the end.
